thread.title: Police investigating sex assault of girl, 8, in Thorncliffe Park
thread.title_full: Police investigating sex assault of girl, 8, in Thorncliffe Park | CP24.com

author: Chris Herhalt, CP24.com
title: Police investigating sex assault of girl, 8, in Thorncliffe Park
text:
Toronto police say an eight-year-old girl was sexually assaulted by an unknown man while she was shopping with her parents in Torontoâ€™s Thorncliffe Park neighbourhood.
Police say the girl reported she was approached by a man from behind and sexually assaulted at about 11:15 a.m. on Monday.
The suspect fled in an unknown direction.
He is described as a brown-skinned male, 50-60 years old, with a moustache. He was last seen wearing a black hat, black button-down jacket and blue jeans.
Anyone with information is asked to call police at 416-808-5300, or Crime Stoppers at 416-222-8477 (TIPS).
